personal.name: Jesus Antonio Padres Parada
personal.title: Software Engineer & Founder
personal.bio: Software engineer with 3+ years of experience designing and shipping SaaS applications for enterprise clients. Currently building solutions at Solvr Labs.

experience.title: Founder
experience.summary: Technical consulting practice delivering branding, digital strategy, and custom software solutions.
highlights: Support clients with branding, digital strategy, and technical solutions
Develop processes and workflows focused on improving customer experience and operational efficiency

details.description: Founded Solvr Labs to help businesses transform their digital presence and streamline operations through custom technology solutions.
responsibilities: Lead client discovery sessions to identify pain points and opportunities
Design and implement custom web applications and automation tools
Create brand identities and digital marketing strategies
Build scalable workflows that improve operational efficiency
achievements: Developed reusable frameworks for rapid client delivery

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.summary: Full-stack development of SaaS applications for enterprise and university clients.
highlights: Designed, developed, and tested SaaS applications for enterprise and university clients, focusing on reliability and scalability
Wrote and maintained clean, modular code in Python, JavaScript, and SQL for full-stack delivery
Built automated test suites with Selenium and JUnit, improving test efficiency by 95%
Collaborated cross-functionally with PMs, QA, and DevOps teams for seamless CI/CD via Jenkins
Monitored and debugged production issues using centralized logs, maintaining system uptime

details.description: Worked on Qualtrics' experience management platform, building tools that help organizations collect and analyze feedback at scale.
responsibilities: Develop new features for survey creation and distribution platform
Maintain and optimize existing codebase for performance
Write comprehensive unit and integration tests
Participate in on-call rotation for production support
Conduct code reviews and mentor junior developers
achievements: Reduced production incidents through proactive monitoring
Contributed to platform serving millions of survey responses

experience.title: Computer Science Tutor
experience.summary: Mentored students in core CS fundamentals and software engineering practices.
highlights: Mentored students in data structures, algorithms, and software engineering fundamentals using Java, Python, and C
Guided learners in debugging and testing strategies to strengthen independent problem-solving skills

details.description: Provided one-on-one and group tutoring for computer science students, helping them master fundamental concepts and develop strong problem-solving skills.
responsibilities: Conduct tutoring sessions for all computer science courses
Help students debug code and understand error messages
Explain complex concepts using real-world analogies
Create practice problems and study materials
achievements: Helped dozens of students improve their grades
Developed teaching materials still used by tutoring center
Received consistently positive feedback from students

details.description: Strong foundation in multiple programming paradigms with production experience.
Building modern, accessible, and performant user interfaces.
DevOps and infrastructure tooling for reliable software delivery.
Comprehensive testing strategies and debugging complex systems.
Collaborative development practices and project management.
Strong interpersonal skills with experience in mentoring and team collaboration.

projects.title: Test Automation Framework
projects.summary: Built comprehensive automated test suites achieving 95% efficiency improvement in QA processes.

details.description: Designed and implemented a comprehensive test automation framework that dramatically improved QA efficiency and release confidence.
features: Page Object Model architecture for maintainability
Parallel test execution for faster feedback
details.impact: Reduced manual testing time by 95%, enabling faster release cycles and higher confidence in deployments.
details.role: Lead developer responsible for architecture, implementation, and team training.

projects.title: TaskLine
projects.summary: Client portal for freelancers with task requests, instant quoting, and one-click approvals.

details.description: A professional client portal that centralizes client communication, task requests, pricing approvals, and project progress for freelancers.
features: Task request to approval workflow with instant quoting
Magic link authentication for passwordless client login
Project timeline with upcoming and completed tasks
In-app messaging and file sharing per project
Custom branding options for Pro tier
details.impact: Streamlines freelancer-client communication, eliminating lost requests in email and reducing approval friction.
details.role: Sole developer — designed architecture, built full-stack application, and deployed to production.

projects.title: MealMaster
projects.summary: Meal planning and recipe discovery app with weekly calendar, saved recipes, and smart search.

details.description: A modern meal planning application featuring recipe search via Spoonacular API, personal recipe collections, and weekly meal planning with a brutalist design aesthetic.
features: Smart recipe search with detailed nutrition and cooking info
JWT-based authentication with secure password hashing
Weekly meal planner with drag-and-drop scheduling
Brutalist UI with bold borders and monospace typography
details.impact: Demonstrates full-stack proficiency with React frontend, FastAPI backend, and third-party API integration.
details.role: Sole developer — built 12-week project covering frontend, backend, database design, and API integration.
